properties.title: Cloud and aerosol products_Regional_S3A/SLSTR
properties.description: Atmospheric products (cloud and aerosol) derived from S3A/SLSTR observations retrieved using the same radiative transfer physics and assumptions.The retrieval is based on the CISAR (Combined Inversion of Surface and Atmosphere pRoperties) algorithm.
properties.osc:project: ConsIstent Retrieval of Cloud Aerosol Surface
